physical_appearance: This is a cream coloured baju panjang. It has embossed floral patterns, and short sleeves.
sgcool_label_text: The baju panjang is made of silk fabric with embossed floral patterns, and lined with panels of linen on the inside. In late 19th century Penang , there was a large selection of materials to choose from for the making of  baju panjang, including silk, European cotton and velvet. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
subject_terms_1: flowers (motifs) Peranakan embossed prints tops (garments, general) blouses (main garments)
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Motifs Peranakan (Asian people) Blouses
